name: flight-schedule-pro
description: Weather Cancellation & AI Rescheduling System for Flight Training

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.db:migrate: echo 'Run: psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/001_create_users_table.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/002_create_bookings_table.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/003_create_availability_tables.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/004_create_notifications_table.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/005_create_audit_log_table.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/migrations/006_create_indexes.sql'
scripts.db:seed: echo 'Run: psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/seeds/dev_users.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/seeds/dev_bookings.sql && psql -d flight_schedule_pro -f database/seeds/dev_availability.sql'
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Run: createdb flight_schedule_pro && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/build backend/dist
